repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on the Brahmasūtra written by Mahācārya. Front Blank folio with title Pārāśaryavijayam is written in Granth. Number 66 is written in pink chalk in roman. Blank old folio after the first blank folio with title Pārāśaryavijayam written in Granth script and something which is unclear. One folio with something written on it is placed between this manuscript; the handwriting differs slightly from the manuscript.

msItem.title: Pārāśaryavijaya
msItem.author: Mahācārya
msItem.incipit: [1v]1 pārāśaryyo dayāḷurjayati bahuvidhān vedamārgapratīpān samyaktarkkākhyaśastraiḥ pratibhaṭajanatāgarva [1v] 2 sarvaṃkaṣaistaiḥ ..
msItem.explicit: [115r] 1 titrātyatassīddhacitrasudheḥ hetutayā nuvadan nityānityavivekasyā [illegible 1] pyatyatassidhasyai [folio left blank.]

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 5 blank folio and 115 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. First and last folio are not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Good, some folio with broken corners and edges.

additions.desc: Front Blank folio with title Pārāśaryavijayam is written in Granth. . Number 66 is written in pink chalk in roman.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on [1v].

listBibl.bibl: Pārāśaryavijayam (vol. 1) by Anujacarya or Mahacarya edi P B Ananthacarya Sri Sudarshana press Conjeeveram 1912.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Missing folio numbers are supplied using square brackets.

TEI.text:
[1v]1 śrīrāmānujagurave namaḥ . pārāśaryyo dayāḷurjayati bahuvidhān vedamārgapratīpān samyaktarkkākhyaśastraiḥ pratibhaṭajanatāgarva [1v] 2 sarvaṃkaṣaistaiḥ .. brahmaṇyaiśvaryabhutiguṇagaṇavitatiṃ hartukāmān kutarkakaiḥ . taistai durlaṅghyamāyāvitativiracitai [1v] 3 rnyāyamārgaprahiṇaiḥ ..
[115r] 1 titrātyatassīddhacitrasudheḥ hetutayā nuvadan nityānityavivekasyā (illegible 1) pyatyatassidhasyai (folio left blank.)
